channel.title: XML on sdmx.io e-learning
channel.description: Recent content in XML on sdmx.io e-learning

item.title: Unit 02 SDMX XML data transmission formats
item.description: Introduction XML is the most widely used format for SDMX data transmission because of its early introduction with SDMX 1.0 and the fact that it provides a good balance between usability, human readability and transmission efficiency - particularly if compressed. Since SDMX 1.0, the standard has accumulated seven different variants of the XML data format, more properly known as SDMX-ML. However only three are now relevant for practical purposes: SDMX-ML 2.
